Generated Narrative: ValueSet conditions

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 371409005 (Disorder of eye region (disorder))

name: OphthalmologyConditionCodesValueSet
title: Ophthalmology Condition ICD10 and SNOMED codes ValueSet
description: Clinical findings for the eye region.
